thread.title: All black on Golden Globes red carpet

title: All black on Golden Globes red carpet
text:
All black on Golden Globes red carpet Monday, January 08, 2018 - 01:46 
In solidarity with the Time's Up campaign to fight sexual harrassment in the workplace stars from Dwayne 'the Rock' Johnson to Angelina Jolie wore all black on the red carpet. Rough Cut (No reporter narration)   
In solidarity with the Time's Up campaign to fight sexual harrassment in the workplace stars from Dwayne 'the Rock' Johnson to Angelina Jolie wore all black on the red carpet.
